# Portfolio Project

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 with App Router
- React 19
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Framer Motion for animations
- GSAP for advanced scroll effects

## Design System
- Dark theme (black/charcoal background)
- Inter font family
- Color palette: White, Gray, Cyan accent (#06B6D4)
- Animation style: Slow, smooth easing, subtle movements

## Project Structure
All sections are built and ready to customize:
- Hero: Parallax effect with large typography
- About: Storytelling layout
- Projects: Animated cards with hover effects
- Stack: Visual tech display
- Contact: Minimal design

## Development
Run `npm run dev` to start the development server at http://localhost:3000

## Customization Tips
- Update content in each section component
- Modify colors in globals.css
- Add GSAP effects for advanced scrolling
- Replace placeholder project data with real projects
